overview: Daniel Huebner is responsible for early stage investments at S-Beteiligungen, the venture capital and private equity branch of savings bank Sparkasse Leipzig. He is contact person for firms seeking venture capital funding by early stage VC fund TechnologiegrÃ¼nderfonds Sachsen (TGFS) in the Leipzig area. Mr Huebner has a background in banking, starting his career at Sparkasse Leipzig in 1999, working in the private and commercial banking area before joining S-Beteiligungen in 2005. He completed his part-time degree in bank management at the Frankfurt School of Finance & Management in 2007.
